      • setToolView

        public void setToolView(ActionBarView v,
                        boolean endTool)
        Provided an ActionBarView, show the tool as embedded and with an x to close the tool.
        Parameters:
        v - the action bar view to show.
        endTool - Whether to send out an UNSET_TOOLBAR (end tool) intent when v is null

      • getActionBarColor

        public int getActionBarColor()
        Finds the selected saved color value from the preferences parses the color and apply a 99% alpha to allow for transparency under the action bar if parsing fails , default original action bar is used
        Returns:
        int Color to be used for the action bar

      • onNavButtonsVisible

        Called when the top-left nav buttons have been turned on or off

        Parameters:
        visible - True if buttons visible
